title: MUDD CLUB Rummage Sale event benefitting The Bowery Mission Women's Centers
desc: Victoria Barlett Richard Boch Jeffrey Deitch Eric Goode Kim Gordon Deborah Harry Kim Hastreiter David Herskovitz Darryl Kerrigan Humberto Leon Debbi Mazar Patrick McMullan Robert Molnar Lisa Rosen Lola Montes Schnabel Kate Simon Anna Sui threeASFOUR Linda Yablonsky GrandLife is the creative lifestyle arm of the Soho Grand and Tribeca Grand Hotels (now The Roxy) downtown Manhattan?s original hotel pioneers and the first to introduce the luxury boutique hotel experience to downtown Manhattan. GrandLife removes the walls and physical boundaries of the hotels, offering cultural events and experiences inspired by the NYC lifestyle. The Bowery Mission has served homeless and hungry New Yorkers since 1879. This year, The Bowery Mission provided more than 382,400 meals to men, women and children, 93,700 nights of shelter and 46,800 articles of clothing, as well as showers, haircuts, and expert medical and optometric care. Each meal and every night of shelter is an invitation to its residential recovery programs, where lives are transformed from hopelessness to hope.  ?For more information, please contact Laurie-Anne Bentley, 646-362-3121 or
